DOC.brief_summary: This study is conducted in Japan. The aim of this observational study is to evaluate the long-term safety and efficacy of activated recombinant human factor VII (NovoSeven®) in subjects with congenital FVII deficiency.
DOC.brief_title: Observational Study on Safety and Efficacy of NovoSeven® in Subjects With Congenital FVII Deficiency
DOC.criteria: Congenital FVII deficiency Never been treated with NovoSeven® before Patients already in treatment with NovoSeven® History of hypersensitivity to any of the components in NovoSeven®
